results.title: A resolution designating April 5, 2017, as "Gold Star Wives Day".
results.short_title: A resolution designating April 5, 2017, as "Gold Star Wives Day".
results.latest_major_action: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2220; text: CR S2219)
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates April 5, 2017, as Gold Star Wives Day.  Recognizes the contributions of the members of the Gold Star Wives of America, Inc., and their dedication to the members and veterans of the Armed Forces.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates April 5, 2017, as Gold Star Wives Day.  Recognizes the contributions of the members of the Gold Star Wives of America, Inc., and their dedication to the members and veterans of the Armed Forces.

actions.description: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2220; text: CR S2219)
